Package com.topcoder.util.file

Interface Summary
Template Abstracts a template processing class.
TemplateData This interface abstract the input data used by templates to the rest of the design.
 

Class Summary
DocumentGenerator This is the main class of the design and the only API class that the users will interact with in most cases.
DocumentGeneratorCommand The DocumentGeneratorCommand class is the command line class used to execute document generation.
DocumentGeneratorFactory The DocumentGeneratorFactory class defines a static method to create DocumentGenerator instance based on the passed in ConfigurationObject.
Util Helper class for this component.
 

Exception Summary
DocumentGeneratorConfigurationException Thrown by DocumentGeneratorFacotry to indicate that any error occurs during configure DocumentGenerator.
InvalidConfigException Exception thrown to indicate invalid config manager config data: missing sources property missing "id_class" property for a class instantiation error of a configured class (wraps the actual exception - might be template source implementation specific) propagated from the template source constructor (config errors / missing properties specific to the implementation) Thrown in the DocumentGenerator class constructor and getInstance() method (see their javadocs for details).
TemplateDataFormatException Exception thrown to signal invalid template data in DocumentGenerator.applyTemplate method and Template implementations.
TemplateFormatException Exception thrown to signal an invalid template in DocumentGenerator.getTemplate, parseTemplate, applyTemplate, getFields and in the Template implementations.
